Author: Cornelius_Rex
Text: It's honestly...  Scary as hell.  Dude I dont want to gain 50lbs.  I just don't want to constsntly crave and crave and crave and crave more and more and more.  I don't even care about the fat gain.  I know, from experience, I can literallydiet or even fast it all off if my doctor were to tell me 'lose weight or die.'  No problem.  But I'm just miserable....  Totally damn miserable.

Author: weegey
Text: Iâ€™m proud of you for choosing to honor your hunger.  I hope you are able to heal and regain your strength.  The youtuber Stephanie Buttermore is currently on a similar journey, and she has said in recent videos that she is feeling much better, stronger, happier, and less ravenous after a few months of being true to her bodies needs.
